name: Flux.la
description:
Flux.la is a modern product consulting firm based out of Los Angeles that specializes in providing user-centric web and mobile solutions.  We’ve worked with a variety of growing ventures and enterprises, pushing one company to a successful exit and creating over a dozen startups in just a few months. We value great design and scalable solutions.  We focus on crafting high quality apps and websites that will truly help your business flourish.
We help our clients craft successful marketing campaigns and leverage data analysis to place their products in front of the people that matter the most.  We’re a small team of motivated entrepreneurs with backgrounds in computer science, engineering, design, business and marketing.   We love hearing about new ideas so feel free to shoot us a message.
